template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a multi-case customer support automation workflow for a {business_type} that involves triage, automatic resolution of simple issues, escalation of complex cases, and performance tracking; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a multi-case customer support automation workflow for a managed hosting provider that involves triage, automatic resolution of simple issues, escalation of complex cases, and performance tracking; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Design a workflow that automatically triages support requests, resolves common issues, escalates complex cases, and tracks performance metrics.
message.reasoning_content:
Okay, let's parse the user's request. They want a single-sentence prompt under 40 words for a customer support automation workflow. The key components are triage, automatic resolution, escalation, and performance tracking. 

Need to condense all elements into one concise sentence. Maybe start with the main goal: automating customer support. Then list the steps briefly: triage, auto-fix simple issues, escalate complex ones, and track performance. 

Keep it under 40 words. Let me count: "Design a workflow that automatically triages support requests, resolves common issues, escalates complex cases, and tracks performance metrics." Thatâ€™s 18 words. Hits all points without extra fluff.
